replies.message: Why compare? .-.
Pink Floyd: 200 million, in a time when the world population was about half of what it is now.
To show Em can't be fucked with? Duh.
People also couldn't download music illegally @gab
I love Em!!!!! Simply one of the best rappers....Period.
There are not "plenty" of people who are better. Eminem is easily top 5 greatest rappers of all time, possibly top 3, and without a doubt the best rapper alive.
Don't get why people always have to compare. Eminem is a fantastic artist. And IMO the 2nd best rapper ever. That's all that needs to be said. Eminem is great
Boss
^^ Andre 3000 lmaooo u saying he's one of the best? -_______-
^^Damn dude really has NO life been commenting back on everything people say, fuckin losers today man i don't get it
2Pac
Andre 3000 are you dumb Kyle ?
Eminem has been out longer then all those artist though. That's kind of a big jump
Yea Eminem also sold records before illegal downloading was so popular
Em already said Andre 3000 is the greatest lyricist alive, and I give him props for recognizing, so you kids can hush now.

The people that are calling you dumb for saying Andre 3000 are the ones that know nothing about Hip Hop lol. Probably don't even know that Eminem mentioned him in Till I Collapse as one of the greatest and that's he's always mentioned in people's top 10 lists. I'd also add Rakim and KRS-One.
Britney.... Over 100 million WORLDWIDE

Eminem also said he himself was the best ever.  He also said tupac was the best ever. So obviously he thinks there are more than one. In any interview eminem is way to humble to say he's the best. But since we're judging this by who says what; do you know how many rappers and artist have said eminem is the best to ever rap?... Lol more than a few I promise
None of these artist have been around as long as emineim he has them beat by 5+years min so u can't compare sales unless they all have been around the same number of yrs
Katherine Inerd Skidmore
Not denying his talent. But em has been around since before illegal downloading was a thing
Christopher Kern

Em no he hasn't lol. P2P file sharing had been around a few years before Eminem's first album came out. Napster was around the same year his first album came out. Unless you were like 2 in 1999, you would know Napster was a huge thing.
don't you people remember kazaa and limewire? shits been around since eminem's days lol
